titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2272) to invest in innovation through research and development, and to improve the competitiveness of the United States.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2272) to invest in innovation through research and development, and to improve the competitiveness of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-293, by Ms. Sutton.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2272 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 602.
DEBATE - The House proceeded further with debate on H. Res. 602.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 198 (Roll no. 791).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 194 (Roll no. 792).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2272 (America COMPETES Act).
